text: Following is a table of United States presidential elections in Hawaii, ordered by year. Since its admission to statehood in 1959, Hawaii has participated in every U.S. presidential election. Winners of the state are in bold. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Year ! Winner (nationally) ! Votes ! Percent ! Loser (nationally) ! Votes ! Percent ! Other national candidatesFor purposes of these lists, other national candidates are defined as those who won at least one electoral vote, or won at least ten percent of the vote in multiple states. !
